p: A double-blind randomized controlled trial involving 350 women who consumed an algal oil source of DHA 600 mg/die vs. placebo from <20 week of gestation to birth led to a higher duration of pregnancy and infant biometry, not affecting the ponderal index, intended as the proportion of fat and lean mass. Fish oil could be responsible for longer pregnancy due to the effect of EPA and ARA-derived prostaglandins [ 57].
